text: The Herveo plump toad (Orsornophryne percrassa) is a species of toad. They belong to the family Bufonidae. They live in Colombia. Their habitat is subtropical or tropical forests. They like to live on high-altitude grasslands. Their population is dying because of habitat loss. == References == * Bol√≠var, W. & Lynch, J. 2004. Osornophryne percrassa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 July 2007. Category:Toads Category:Frogs of South America
title: Herveo plump toad
